zh_title:
[模组] 框架
兼容性提醒
zh_content: 目前在同时安装了恋爱与结婚（Lovers）和社交页（Social Page）时创建新游戏会导致游戏崩溃，且未结婚的存档可能会被强制结婚，建议暂时删除社交页（Social Page）。
en_content: Currently, if you install both "Lovers" and "Social Page", creating a new game will cause the game to crash, and unmarried saves may be forced to marry. It is recommended to temporarily delete "Social Page".
